TEXT.S: = Kazangiljan = Gaga mniq Pingtung Macyasyang ka alang Kazangiljan. 294 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 1,052 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 1,015 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 37 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Paiwan93%, Rukai1%, Tayal1%, ni rahuq na o1%.
